main.name: Amantina Sosa
main.description: Ascending Latina software engineer with a passion for making tech available for all.
main.bio: My name is Amantina, I am an aspiring software engineer with a BA in Psychology & Studio Art from Hunter College. I recently graduated from Fullstack Academy the coding bootcamp. I learned computer science fundamentals, front-end and back-end development, database management, common tools and best practices.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Completed 108 hours of instruction in HTML, CSS and JavaScript in preparation for advanced bootcamp and career opportunities.
Completed 600+ hours of intensive coding; consisting of HTML, CSS, JS. Created websites in order to help communities that are disenfranchised by offering them assistance and solutions.

projects.title: Insta Reels Clone
projects.category: Instagram Reels Clone built with ReactJS

projects.title: InstaStack
projects.category: Rapid prototyping tool used to build projects in less than five minutes with a custom look and feel. Built with ReactJS, and Redux

projects.title: Be My Ears
projects.category: A website used to simplify the lives of people who are hard of hearing. Built with ReactJS, and Redux

testimonials.text: When I first met Amantina, she had no prior knowledge of coding, but soon immersed herself in learning as much as she could as quickly as possible. As a student in my tech and entrepreneurship program, her drive led her to quickly rise to the top of her cohort, while also skillfully juggling other important commitments. She's the kind of individual who I would want on my team as she's willing to take on professional challenges that push her far beyond her comfort zone, is relentless in her pursuit of knowledge and in successfully executing a vision to complete a project.
